name: Horde Kronolith to Google Calendar Sync
short_description:
A php script to bidirectionally synchronize Kronolith calendar application of the Horde framework with Google Calendar.

Requires:
- Horde (get at ftp://ftp.horde.org/pub/horde)
- HTTP_Request (install using PEAR)
- Google Calendar API v3 PHP library (get at http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/)

Create file access_ids.php in root directory for acces data. Run setup_gcal.php to set up Google Calendar API access.

Script sync.php should be run as a cron job.
